verses.roman:
prati-roma-kūpe māṁsa--vraṇera ākāra
tāra upare romodgama--kadamba-prakāra

synonyms: prati-roma-kūpe—in every hair hole; māṁsa—the flesh; vraṇera ākāra—like pimples; tāra upare—upon that; roma-udgama—standing of the hair; kadamba-prakāra—like the kadamba flowers.
translation: The flesh at each of His pores erupted like pimples, and His hair, standing on end, appeared like kadamba flowers.
